pages.text: 19|39|nastabeadhattinre divasattepparri athava karyam (antimamayi) tirumanikkappetunna sandarbhattepparri ni avarkk takkit nalkuka. avar asrad'dhayilakappettirikkukayakunnu. avar visvasikkunnilla
19|40|tirccayayum nam tanneyan bhumiyuteyum atilullavayuteyum anantaravakasiyakunnat‌. nam'mute atukkalekk tanneyayirikkum avar matakkappetunnat‌
19|41|vedagranthattil ibrahiminepparriyulla vivaram ni parannukeatukkuka. tirccayayum addeham satyavanum pravacakanumayirunnu
19|42|addeham tanre pitavineat paranna sandarbham (srad'dheyamakunnu:) enre pitave, kelkkukayea, kanukayea ceyyatta, tankalkk yatearu upakaravum ceyyatta vastuve tankal entin aradhikkunnu
19|43|enre pitave, tirccayayum tankalkk vannukittiyittillatta ariv enikk vannukittiyittunt‌. akayal tankal enne pintataru. nan tankalkk sariyaya margam kaniccutaram
19|44|enre pitave, tankal pisacine aradhikkarut‌. tirccayayum pisac paramakarunikaneat anusaranamillattavanakunnu
19|45|enre pitave, tirccayayum paramakarunikanil ninnulla valla siksayum tankale badhikkumenn nan bhayappetunnu. appeal tankal pisacinre mitramayirikkunnatan‌

19|46|ayal parannu: he; ibrahim, ni enre daivannale ventenn vekkukayanea? ni (itil ninn‌) viramikkunnillenkil nan ninne kallerinneatikkuka tanne ceyyum. kure kalattekk ni ennil ninn vittumarikkeallanam
19|47|addeham (ibrahim) parannu: tankalkk salam. tankalkk venti nan enre raksitavineat papameacanam tetam. tirccayayum avanenneat dayayullavanakunnu
19|48|ninnaleyum allahuvin purame ninnal prart'thiccuvarunnavayeyum nan vetiyunnu. enre raksitavineat nan prart'thikkunnu. enre raksitavineat prart'thikkunnat mulam nan bhagyam kettavanakatirunnekkam

19|49|annane avareyum allahuvin purame avar aradhikkunnavayeyum vetinn addeham peayappeal addehattin nam isakhineyum (makan) ya'akhubineyum (petran) nalki. avareyeakke nam pravacakanmarakkukayum ceytu
19|50|nam'mute karunyattil ninnum avarkk nam nalkukayum, avarkk nam unnatamaya salkirtti untakkukayum ceytu
19|51|vedagranthattil musayepparriyulla vivaravum ni parannukeatukkuka. tirccayayum addeham niskalankanayirunnu. addeham dutanum pravacakanumayirunnu
